abstract: Two deer surprisingly found on Wednesday near the base of the Verrazano-Narrows Bridge were brought back to a city animal shelter. One had died, the other was set loose on Staten Island.
snippet: Two deer surprisingly found on Wednesday near the base of the Verrazano-Narrows Bridge were brought back to a city animal shelter. One had died, the other was set loose on Staten Island.

headline.main: A Wayward Deer Rescued in Brooklyn Later Died
